page.title: 01Our Domesday Project Area.
page.content: Our Domesday Project block is a rural area. The villages in the area are Waltham,part of Barnoldby le Beck, New Waltham,Brigsley and Scartho.There are 2 streams in the block,Waithe Beck and Buck Beck which prevents the land around Waltham from flooding by taking the water to the River Humber. Waltham has an unusual feature of a windmill. The families of some of the people have lived and worked in this area for a number of generations,others have moved here to the new estates being built, because they like the peace and quiet of the countryside and are able to reach their place of work in Grimsby,Immingham, Cleethorpes and the Humber Bank by car. The villagers use the shops and other amenities found in the area for their everyday needs and take part in village activities and clubs.
